title: Unseen Faith
excerpt: True faith believes what is not seen and clings to the promises of God even in the dark.

title: Freedom from Sin
excerpt: We are no longer slaves to sin. Through Christ, we have the power to overcome and walk in holiness.

title: Growing in Godliness
excerpt: Spiritual maturity takes time, intention, and grace. God is shaping you more each day into the likeness of His Son.

title: Repentance
excerpt: Repentance is not just feeling sorry for sin. It's turning away from it—and turning to God with your whole heart.

title: The Way of Humility
excerpt: God opposes the proud but gives grace to the humble. Humility is the posture of every true disciple.

title: God at Work in You
excerpt: Sanctification is God’s work in us. We pursue holiness, but it is God who gives both the desire and strength.

title: Christ, Our Living Hope
excerpt: Christ is not only our past Savior but our present help and future hope. He is alive—and so is our hope.

title: The Gift of Discernment: Growing in Spiritual Wisdom
excerpt: Discernment is essential for Christians. It is the ability to distinguish truth from error and good from evil.

title: Resting in the Finished Work of Christ
excerpt: Jesus said, 'It is finished.' We are justified by His completed work—not our efforts. Rest in His grace.

title: Abiding in Christ
excerpt: True spiritual growth comes not from striving, but from staying rooted in Christ. To abide is to depend, dwell, and remain close to Him daily—through prayer, Scripture, and surrender.

title: The Discipline of Contentment
excerpt: True contentment is not about circumstances—it is about Christ. When we learn to rest in God's provision, we are free from comparison, anxiety, and striving.
